name: red panda
description: Look for a rust-colored, cat-sized creature with a bushy, ringed tail, often curled up in a tree branch or munching on bamboo—like a fiery fox crossed with a raccoon.

name: Gray Wolf
description: Look for a large, lanky canine with a thick gray or tawny coat, often moving in a pack with a confident, loping gait—its piercing yellow eyes and alert ears signal its wild intelligence.
